# onTheGo

**Type Property**

A playlist created on a device rather than synced from the Music app.

## Declaration

```swift
static var onTheGo: MPMediaPlaylistAttribute { get }
```

## Constants

- **smart**: A smart playlist includes items that match one or more user-specified rules.
- **genius**: A Genius playlist includes items related to other items in your Music library.
